description: Generate a page with HTML/SCSS/JS (ES module) files. 'index.js' and 'index.scss' are used by 'index.html' containing an element (class 'root'). Element '.root' fills the whole viewport of the page. 'index.js' is an empty file.

Add a toolkit container (class 'toolkit') and an SVG element (class 'canvas') in '.root'. Toolkit and canvas together fill the whole space of the browser viewport. Add a shape container (class 'shape'), a prop container (class 'prop') and an operation container (class 'operation') horizontally in the toolkit. The shape container (3 label widths) is on the toolkit's left side. The operation container (6 label widths) is on the toolkit's right side. The prop container occupies the toolkit's remaining space. Add a line width input (class 'line-width', value from 1 to 21, default is 9) in the prop container. Add a color selector input (class 'color', default is #000000) in the prop container.

Add radio buttons wrapped by labels in the shape container with values: line, rect, ellipse. Add radio buttons wrapped by labels in the operation container with values: move, rotate, zoom, copy, delete, fill. Each radio in both shape and operation containers has the same name 'operation'. Each label's class is the value of its inner radio. Generate an SVG image using the label's class and use it as the label's background image. Set each radio button's width/height to 0 but do not hide them.

When clicking the line label, use the mouse on the canvas to draw an SVG line (line width is '.line-width' value, line color is '.color' value). The line's start point is the point when the mouse is pressed down and end point is the point when the mouse is released.

When clicking the rect label, use the mouse on the canvas to draw an SVG rectangle (fill color is white, line width is '.line-width' value, line color is '.color' value). The rectangle's top-left is the point when the mouse is pressed down and bottom-right is the point when the mouse is released.

When clicking the ellipse label, use the mouse on the canvas to draw an SVG ellipse (fill color is white, line width is '.line-width' value, line color is '.color' value). There is a rectangle whose top-left is the point when the mouse is pressed down and bottom-right is the point when the mouse is released. The ellipse's center is the rectangle's center, the x-radius is half the rectangle's width, the y-radius is half the rectangle's height.
After the delete label is clicked, click any shape (line/rect/ellipse/...) in the canvas to delete it.
After the fill label is clicked, click any shape (line/rect/ellipse/...) in the canvas to set its fill color to '.color' value.
After the copy label is clicked, click any shape (line/rect/ellipse/...) in the canvas to copy itself. The copied shape is placed 20 pixels to the right and 20 pixels below the original shape.
When the length of the line is less than line width, keep it at the line width.
When the width or height of the rectangle is less than line width, keep it at the line width.
When the x-radius or y-radius of the ellipse is less than half the line width, keep it at half the line width.
After the move label is clicked, drag any shape in the canvas.
After the rotate label is clicked, drag to rotate any shape in the canvas around its center.
Perform move and rotate operations on a shape in any sequence, ensuring that each operation builds on the previous one.
After the zoom label is clicked, drag to zoom any shape in the canvas according to the distance between mouse position and its center. Zoom the shape around its center.
Perform move, rotate, and zoom operations on a shape in any sequence, ensuring that each operation builds on the previous one.
Automatically select the move label after creating or copying a shape.
Press and hold the spacebar to enable move mode. Release it to restore the selected label if needed.
Support touch events for operations: create, copy, delete, fill.
Support touch events for operations: move, rotate, zoom.
